PHRASE.LANG: Le plan oeuftraordinaire du Baron (Objet actif)
Il Maliziuovoso Piano del Barone (Oggetto attivo)
El plan oval del Barón (Objeto activo)
バロンのエッグセレントな計画
Baron伯爵偷蛋計畫（動態道具）
Baron伯爵偷蛋計畫（動態道具）

Lucy Goose just wants to sit on her nest in peace, but that naughty rabbit Baron von Eggenschtealer keeps running off with her eggs. Worse still, he's not even careful with them - he drops them everywhere! Will you collect them for her? She's known to reward her helpers generously... [#Legal]

Lucie l'Oie n'aspire qu'à couver ses œufs en paix, mais ce vilain Baron von Voleurdoeuf veut les lui voler. Pire encore, il n'en prend pas soin et les fait tomber n'importe où ! Sauras-tu les rassembler pour Lucie ? On dit qu'elle récompense généreusement ceux qui l'aident... [#Legal]

Lucy Gans möchte nur in Frieden auf ihrem Nest, doch der freche Hase Baron von Eggenschtiehler klaut andauernd ihre Eier. Noch schlimmer ist, dass er noch nicht einmal behutsam mit ihnen umgeht - er lässt sie überall fallen! Hilfst du ihr, sie einzusammeln? Sie ist bekannt dafür, ihre Helfer reich zu belohnen... [#Legal]

Lucy Loca vuole starsene in santa pace a covare sul suo nido, ma quel terribile coniglio del Barone Sgrafignuoven continua a scappare via con le sue uova. Ma quel che è peggio, è che non sta per niente attento e le lascia cadere ovunque! Potresti raccoglierle per lei? È risaputo che sia molto generosa con chi l'aiuta... [#Legal]

Lucy Goose sólo quiere sentarse en su nido en paz, pero ese maldito conejo, el Barón von Eggenschtealer, no deja de arrebatarle sus huevos. Peor aún, ni siquiera es cuidadoso con ellos, ¡se le caen por todas partes! ¿Los recogerás por Lucy? Tiene fama de recompensar generosamente a sus ayudantes... [#Legal]
ガチョウのルーシーはただ自分の巣を温めたいだけなのに、あの憎きウサギ男爵が卵を横取りします。またそれを落としたりして凄く適当に扱うのです。それらのかわいそうな卵達を集めてくれますか？ルーシーは恩を絶対に忘れたりしません。 [#Legal]

루시 구스는 둥지에서 편히 쉬고 싶었지만, 장난꾸러기 토끼인 폰 에겐슈틸러 남작이 자꾸 그녀의 알을 훔쳐 달아납니다. 물론 그가 부주의하게도 여기 저기에 알을 떨어뜨리는 것이 더 문제입니다! 그녀를 대신해서 알들을 다시 모아 주시겠습니까? 루시는 도움을 받으면 언제나 답례를 한답니다...\n\n※해당 아이템은 액티브 아이템입니다. 액티브 아이템은 보통 가구들 보다 더 많은 기능성을 제공합니다. 자신의 아파트나 클럽 하우스에는 한 번에 두 개의 액티브 아이템을 설치할 수 있습니다. [#Legal]

Lucy Goose just wants to sit on her nest in peace, but that naughty rabbit Baron von Eggenschtealer keeps running off with her eggs. Worse still, he's not even careful with them - he drops them everywhere! Will you collect them for her? She's known to reward her helpers generously...\n\n*This is an Active item. Active items provide more functionality than a normal furniture item. You may only place up to two Active items in your apartment or clubhouse at any time.[#Legal]
母鵝露西的要求不多，只想靜靜躺在窩裡。可是兔子伯爵「愛蛋貴族」實在很皮，老是偷走她的蛋。更慘的是他神經很大條，老是把蛋弄丟。請幫她把蛋找回來吧。她對幫忙的人會重重有賞…。\n\n※這是一個動態道具。動態道具可提供比一般道具更多的功能。您最多只能在個人空間或聯盟俱樂部擺設2個動態道具。[#Legal]
母鵝露西的要求不多，只想靜靜躺在窩裡。可是兔子伯爵「愛蛋貴族」實在很皮，老是偷走她的蛋。更慘的是他神經很大條，老是把蛋弄丟。請幫她把蛋找回來吧。她對幫忙的人會重重有賞…。\n\n※這是一個動態道具。動態道具可提供比一般道具更多的功能。您最多只能在個人空間或聯盟俱樂部擺設2個動態道具。[#Legal]

Lucy Goose just wants to sit on her nest in peace, but that naughty rabbit Baron von Eggenschtealer keeps running off with her eggs. Worse still, he's not even careful with them - he drops them everywhere! Will you collect them for her? She's known to reward her helpers generously... [#Legal]
You think you're pretty clever, don't you, collecting all those eggs? Well, the stakes just got higher, because I'm going all out to take golden eggs now too. Mwah hah hah hah hah!
Tu penses être capable de rassembler tous ces œufs, n'est-ce pas ? Eh bien, les enjeux viennent d'augmenter car je vais également tout faire pour voler ces œufs d'or. Mouahahaha

Du hältst dich wohl für besonders schlau, was? Nur weil du diese ganzen Eier einsammelst? Tja, aber jetzt wird es erst richtig ernst. Ich werde ab jetzt auch die goldenen Eier klauen. Muah hah hah hah hah!
Credi di essere intelligente, vero, a raccogliere tutte quelle uova? Bene, ti informo che la posta in gioco è salita perché ora il mio obiettivo sono anche le uova d'oro. Mwah aha! Aha! Aha! Aha!
Te crees muy listo porque has recogido todos esos huevos, ¿verdad? Bien, ¡juguemos fuerte! Ahora también voy a ir a por los huevos de oro. Mua, ¡ja, ja, ja!
あなたそれで自分がデきると思っているの？じゃあこちらも本気で金の卵を狙いに行きますね！わっはっはっは！
너, 그 알들을 모두 모으니까 네가 아주 영리하다고 생각하고 있는 거지? 그래, 이번에는 한 번 해볼만 하구만, 왜냐면 이제 내가 나가서 그 황금색 알들을 모두 갖고 올꺼거든. 음 하하하하!
You think you're pretty clever, don't you, collecting all those eggs? Well, the stakes just got higher, because I'm going all out to take golden eggs now too. Mwah hah hah hah hah!
你以為能找到這些蛋就高人一等嗎？要玩就玩大的。我要使出畢生絕學，這次連金蛋都要偷光光。哇哈哈哈哈！
你以為能找到這些蛋就高人一等嗎？要玩就玩大的。我要使出畢生絕學，這次連金蛋都要偷光光。哇哈哈哈哈！
You think you're pretty clever, don't you, collecting all those eggs? Well, the stakes just got higher, because I'm going all out to take golden eggs now too. Mwah hah hah hah hah!
Curses! You snatched that lovely golden egg right out of my paws! I'll get my revenge on you, you meddler, you see if I don't!
Zut ! Tu as arraché ce bel œuf d'or de mes pattes ! Je me vengerai, vaurien, tu verras !
Verflixt! Du hast mir dieses wunderbare goldene Ei direkt vor der Nase weggeschnappt! Ich werde mich rächen, du Störenfried, du wirst schon sehen!
Maledizione! Mi hai strappato quel delizioso uovo dorato dalle zampe! Mi vendicherò, ficcanaso, vedrai se lo faccio!
¡Maldición! ¡Me acabas de arrebatar ese bonito huevo de oro de mis patas! Me las pagarás, entrometido, ¡ya lo verás!
このヤロー！俺の手元からその金の卵を盗んだな！いつか絶対仕返ししてやる！
죽어라! 네가 감히 그 사랑스런 황금색 알들을 내 발톱에서 채가다니! 네가 너에게 반드시 복수를 할 것이다, 이 훼방꾼 놈아, 두고 보자!
Curses! You snatched that lovely golden egg right out of my paws! I'll get my revenge on you, you meddler, you see if I don't!
可惡！你膽敢搶走那顆漂亮金蛋！此仇不報非君子，咱們走著瞧！
可惡！你膽敢搶走那顆漂亮金蛋！此仇不報非君子，咱們走著瞧！
Curses! You snatched that lovely golden egg right out of my paws! I'll get my revenge on you, you meddler, you see if I don't!

可惡！你膽敢搶走那顆漂亮金蛋！此仇不報非君子，咱們走著瞧！
可惡！你膽敢搶走那顆漂亮金蛋！此仇不報非君子，咱們走著瞧！
Curses! You snatched that lovely golden egg right out of my paws! I'll get my revenge on you, you meddler, you see if I don't!
Not only have you helped me, but I hear you're a friend of the swans too! Well, then you deserve something extra special!
Non seulement tu m'as aidée, mais je vois que tu es également l'ami des cygnes ! Dans ce cas, tu mérites une récompense spéciale.
Du hast nicht nur mir geholfen, wie ich höre, bist du auch ein Freund der Schwäne! Nun, dann hast du dir etwas Gans besonderes verdient!
Non solo mi hai aiutata, ma ho sentito dire che sei anche amico dei cigni! Bene, allora meriti qualcosa di ancora più speciale!
No solamente me has ayudado; ¡también he oído que eres amigo de los cisnes! En ese caso, mereces algo excepcional.
あなた白鳥さん達と友達らしいわね！そしたらこれもあげる！
당신이 저를 많이 도와주셨지만 백조의 친구이기도 하다고 들었어요! 그렇다면, 당신은 추가로 이 특별한 것을 받을 자격이 있어요.
Not only have you helped me, but I hear you're a friend of the swans too! Well, then you deserve something extra special!
我聽說你不但幫了我，還是天鵝的好朋友！那我更要送你特別大禮了！
我聽說你不但幫了我，還是天鵝的好朋友！那我更要送你特別大禮了！
Not only have you helped me, but I hear you're a friend of the swans too! Well, then you deserve something extra special!

我聽說你不但幫了我，還是天鵝的好朋友！那我更要送你特別大禮了！
我聽說你不但幫了我，還是天鵝的好朋友！那我更要送你特別大禮了！
Not only have you helped me, but I hear you're a friend of the swans too! Well, then you deserve something extra special!
Foiled again! How dare you keep those eggs from me? I hope this bench gets woodworm!
Encore raté ! Comment as-tu osé me prendre ces œufs ? J'espère que ce banc est vermoulu !
Schon wieder geschlagen! Du wagst es, mir diese Eier vorzuenthalten? Ich hoffe, dass diese Bank von Holzwürmern zerfressen wird!
Mi hai di nuovo messo i bastoni tra le ruote! Come osi continuare a prenderti le uova? Spero che questa panchina venga divorata dai tarli!
¡Otro intento frustrado! ¿Cómo te atreves a interponerte entre esos huevos y yo? ¡Espero que ese banco se carcoma!
なんで僕から卵を盗る！？シロアリに巣くわれているといいね、これ。
다시 한 번 포장을 했다구! 감히 이 알들을 내가 갖고 가지 못하게 막아? 이 벤치를 나무벌레가 파 먹으면 좋겠네!
Foiled again! How dare you keep those eggs from me? I hope this bench gets woodworm!
又失敗了！你好大的膽子，敢拿走我的蛋！祝你的椅子被蟲蛀光光！
又失敗了！你好大的膽子，敢拿走我的蛋！祝你的椅子被蟲蛀光光！
Foiled again! How dare you keep those eggs from me? I hope this bench gets woodworm!

You've helped me a lot, so I hope you don't mind me saying... That outfit's a little dull. A nice bright bonnet - that's what you need!
Tu m'as beaucoup aidée, j'espère donc que tu ne m'en voudras pas de dire que… ce costume est un peu triste. Un beau chapeau coloré, voilà ce qu'il te faut !
Du hast mir sehr geholfen und ich hoffe, dass ich mir diese Anmerkung erlauben darf... Dein Kostüm ist etwas langweilige. Ein schöner, moderner Hut - das ist, was du brauchst!
Mi hai aiutato tantissimo, perciò spero tu non ti offenda se ti dico che... Il tuo abbigliamento è un po' scialbo. Un grazioso cappellino dai colori sgargianti è proprio quello che fa per te!
Me has ayudado mucho, así que espero que no te importe que lo diga... Esa ropa es un poco aburrida. ¡Necesitas un sombrero alegre!
あなたには大変助かりましたわ、でもこれだけ言わせて…あなたのその格好少しつまらないわね。この明るい麦わら帽子！これがあなたに必要なもの！
당신은 저를 너무 많이 도와주었어요, 그래서 이런 말을 해도 좋을지 모르지만… 그 의상은 조금 맥이 빠지네요. 아주 밝은 색의 보넷 - 그게 당신에게 어울릴 꺼에요!
You've helped me a lot, so I hope you don't mind me saying . . . That outfit's a little dull. A nice bright bonnet - that's what you need!
你真的幫了我很多忙，所以我說句真話，別生氣哦……你穿這樣挺呆的。只要戴上亮色系的帽子，就會比較有型喔！
你真的幫了我很多忙，所以我說句真話，別生氣哦……你穿這樣挺呆的。只要戴上亮色系的帽子，就會比較有型喔！

你真的幫了我很多忙，所以我說句真話，別生氣哦……你穿這樣挺呆的。只要戴上亮色系的帽子，就會比較有型喔！
你真的幫了我很多忙，所以我說句真話，別生氣哦……你穿這樣挺呆的。只要戴上亮色系的帽子，就會比較有型喔！
You've helped me a lot, so I hope you don't mind me saying ... That outfit's a little dull. A nice bright bonnet - that's what you need!
Oh, my - you've helped me so much already - thank you! Butterflies aren't as pretty as my eggs, of course, but I thought you might like them anyway.
Bon sang, tu m'as déjà tellement aidée ! Merci. Les papillons ne sont pas aussi jolis que mes œufs bien sûr, mais j'ai pensé que tu les aimerais quand même.
Oh je - du hast mir schon so sehr geholfen - vielen Dank! Schmetterlinge sind natürlich nicht so schön wie meine Eier, aber ich dachte, sie könnten dir trotzdem gefallen.
Oh, cielo... mi hai già aiutata così tanto, grazie! Le farfalle non sono graziose come le mie uova, ovviamente, ma ho pensato che ti sarebbero piaciute lo stesso.
Vaya, me has ayudado mucho, ¡gracias! Las mariposas no son tan bonitas como mis huevos, naturalmente, pero he pensado que también te gustarían.
まあ！あなたがどれだけ助けになったか - ありがとう！私の卵たちに比べて蝶々は少し見劣りするかもしれないけど、あげるわ！
아, 당신은 이미 저를 너무 많이 도와주었어요 - 고마워요! 물론 나비들이 내 알들 만큼 이쁘지는 않지만, 어쨌든 당신이 그들을 좋아하게 될 거라고 생각했어요.
Oh, my - you've helped me so much already - thank you! Butterflies aren't as pretty as my eggs, of course, but I thought you might like them anyway.
天啊，你已經幫我不少忙了，謝謝你！雖然蝴蝶比不上我的蛋漂亮，不過你應該還是會喜歡。
天啊，你已經幫我不少忙了，謝謝你！雖然蝴蝶比不上我的蛋漂亮，不過你應該還是會喜歡。

天啊，你已經幫我不少忙了，謝謝你！雖然蝴蝶比不上我的蛋漂亮，不過你應該還是會喜歡。
天啊，你已經幫我不少忙了，謝謝你！雖然蝴蝶比不上我的蛋漂亮，不過你應該還是會喜歡。
Oh, my - you've helped me so much already - thank you! Butterflies aren't as pretty as my eggs, of course, but I thought you might like them anyway.
I don't care how many of you there are, I'll take you all on! Enjoy your little sandwich puny human, soon you'll taste only defeat!
Peu importe combien vous êtes, je vous prends tous ! Profite de ton sandwich petit humain, le goût de la victoire est amer !
Es ist mir gleich, wie viele von deiner Sorte es noch gibt, ich werde euch alle niedermachen! Genieße deinen Toast, jämmerlicher Mensch! Du wirst bald bitteren Geschmack der Niederlage schmecken!
Non mi importa quanti siete! Vi affronterò tutti! Goditi il tuo piccolo sandwich, misero umano, perché presto assaporerai l'amara sconfitta!
Me da igual cuántos seáis, ¡me enfrentaré a todos vosotros! Disfruta de tu sándwich, humano enclenque, ¡lo único que saborearás dentro de poco es la derrota!
何人来ようが関係ない！このサンドイッチを少しでも味わうといいよ！この後はすべて敗北の味ばっかだからね！

¡Ahora mismo escribiré en mi diario cuánto me has ayudado! ¡No te preocupes! Esas cosas no se me olvidan.

[GOOSE]Oh, vielen Dank, [LOCALPLAYERNAME]! Dem Himmel sei Dank, du bist da! Dieser böse, kleine Hase ist mit meinen Eiern verschwunden!\n\nDenke daran, je mehr Eier du sammelst, desto mehr Geschenke erhältst du als Belohnung!
[GOOSE]Oh, grazie [LOCALPLAYERNAME]! Grazie al cielo sei qui! Quel piccolo coniglio cattivo è scappato con le mie uova di nuovo!\n\nRicorda: più uova raccogli, più riceverai regali di ringraziamento!

[GOOSE]¡Oh, gracias, [LOCALPLAYERNAME]! ¡Menos mal que has venido! ¡Ese maldito conejo ha vuelto a huir con mis huevos!\n\n\Recuerda: ¡cuántos más huevos recojas, más regalos de agradecimiento conseguirás!
[GOOSE]ありがとう[LOCALPLAYERNAME]さん！来てくれて本当に助かるわ！急で悪いけど助けてください！あの憎いウサギまた私の卵を奪って行ったわ！\n\n覚えてる - 卵を奪い返してくれるほど賞品を渡すわ！
오, 고마워요 [LOCALPLAYERNAME]! 하느님 감사합니다, 당신이 돌아오셨군요! 제발 저를 도와주세요! 저 조그맣고 나쁜 토끼놈이 제 알들을 갖고 다시 도망쳤어요! \n\n 기억하세요 - 당신이 더 많은 알들을 모으면 더 많은 감사의 선물을 받을 거에요!

[GOOSE]Oh, thank you [LOCALPLAYERNAME]! Thank goodness you've come! That nasty little rabbit has run off with my eggs again!\n\nRemember - the more eggs you collect, the more thank you presents you'll get!
[LOCALPLAYERNAME]謝謝你！謝天謝地，你總算來了！那隻死兔子又偷走我的蛋了！\n\n記住，你找回的蛋越多，謝禮就越多！

[GOOSE]Oh, thank you [LOCALPLAYERNAME]! Thank goodness you've come! That nasty little rabbit has run off with my eggs again!\n\nRemember - the more eggs you collect, the more thank you presents you'll get!

[GOOSE]Oh, thank you [LOCALPLAYERNAME]! Thank goodness you've come! That nasty little rabbit has run off with my eggs again!\n\nMy golden eggs are very special - there's a special reward if you save these rare eggs for me.

[GOOSE]Oh merci [LOCALPLAYERNAME] ! Dieu merci, tu es venu ! Ce méchant lapin s'est de nouveau enfui avec mes œufs !\n\nLes œufs d'or sont très spéciaux à mes yeux. Tu obtiendras une récompense spéciale si tu sauves ces œufs pour moi.

Oh, vielen Dank, [LOCALPLAYERNAME]! Dem Himmel sei Dank, du bist da! [GOOSE]Dieser böse, kleine Hase ist mit meinen Eiern verschwunden!\n\nMeine goldenen Eier liegen mir Gans besonders am Herzen - wenn du diese seltenen Eier rettest, erhältst du eine besondere Belohnung.

[GOOSE]Oh, grazie [LOCALPLAYERNAME]! Grazie al cielo sei qui! Quel piccolo coniglio cattivo è scappato con le mie uova di nuovo!\n\nLe mie uova d'oro sono molto importanti per me. C'è una ricompensa speciale per te, se proteggi queste uova rare al posto mio.

[GOOSE]¡Oh, gracias, [LOCALPLAYERNAME]! ¡Menos mal que has venido! ¡Ese maldito conejo ha vuelto a huir con mis huevos!\n\nMis huevos de oro significan mucho para mí... ¡Tendrás una recompensa especial si me ayudas a recuperarlos!

[BUNNY]So, you're back [LOCALPLAYERNAME]! I don't know what makes you think you'll be any more successful in defeating me this time. Do your worst.
[BUNNY]Alors tu es de retour [LOCALPLAYERNAME]! Je ne sais pas ce qui t'a fait penser que tu aurais une chance contre moi cette fois-ci. Fais ce que tu peux.
[BUNNY]Du bist also zurückgekehrt, [LOCALPLAYERNAME]! Ich weiß nicht, warum du denkst, dass du dieses Mal mehr Erfolg haben wirst, mich zu besiegen. Gib dein Bestes.
[BUNNY]Allora... sei di nuovo qui[LOCALPLAYERNAME]! Non so cosa ti faccia pensare che questa volta riuscirai a sconfiggermi. Fai del tuo peggio.
[BUNNY]¡Vaya, has vuelto, [LOCALPLAYERNAME]! No sé qué te hace pensar que esta vez tendrás más suerte y me derrotarás. ¡Allá tú!
[BUNNY]帰ってきたね[LOCALPLAYERNAME]！今回こそ私を倒せるかな？まあせいぜい怪我しないようにね。
그래, 너 돌아왔구만 [LOCALPLAYERNAME]! 이번에는 나를 어떻게 더 잘 이길 수 있을 것이라고 네가 자신하는지 도대체 알 수가 없어. 너의 최악을 다해 봐.
